meanings.definition: The quality of being hard-working and diligent.
meanings.sent1: Her industriousnesses in completing tasks impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their industriousnesses and dedication.
meanings.sent3: His industriousnesses in cleaning the house even on weekends made his friends tease him.
meanings.sent4: The garden flourished under the industriousnesses of the gardener's care.
meanings.sent5: The industriousnesses of the ants gathering food amazed the onlookers.

meanings.sent1: The industriousnesses of the students were evident in their high grades.
meanings.sent2: She admired his industriousnesses in pursuing his goals.
meanings.sent3: The industriousnesses of the bees in making honey fascinated the children.
meanings.sent4: The industriousnesses of the worker bees kept the hive thriving.
meanings.sent5: His industriousnesses shone through in his consistent efforts.

meanings.definition: The habit of working hard and steadily.
meanings.sent1: Her industriousnesses in studying paid off with excellent exam results.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was a result of the industriousnesses of its employees.
meanings.sent3: His industriousnesses in saving money for a trip impressed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The industriousnesses of the marathon runner were evident in every race.
meanings.sent5: The industriousnesses of the squirrel gathering nuts for winter were admirable.
